UniprotID	Q13515
Accession	Q13515;Q14D32;Q9HBW5
EntryName	BFSP2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Phakinin (49 kDa cytoskeletal protein) (Beaded filament structural protein 2) (Lens fiber cell beaded filament protein CP 47) (CP47) (Lens fiber cell beaded filament protein CP 49) (CP49) (Lens intermediate filament-like light) (LIFL-L)
GeneName	BFSP2
Length	415
Function	Required for the correct formation of lens intermediate filaments as part of a complex composed of BFSP1, BFSP2 and CRYAA (PubMed:28935373). Plays a role in maintenance of retinal lens optical clarity (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane; Cytoplasm; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Cytoplasm; Cell cortex
